link.title: Account Link Request
link.account_missing: Requested account not present in this wallet.
link.request: The application '{appName}' from '{origin}' is requesting access to a {chain} account.
link.request_fresh: The application has already linked a {chain} account before as marked in the list below.
link.request_tooltip: The application will receive your account details (name and id) and will establish a wallet link.

relink.title: Account ReLink Request
relink.request: The application '{appName}' from '{origin}' is requesting to relink the previously linked {chain} account: {accountId}. This is usually due to having deleted your browser's cache. On rare ocassions, this may be a phishing attempt so please double check the site you are visiting.
relink.request_tooltip: The previous link between the appplication and the account referencec will be reset.

account_id.title: Account Details Request
account_id.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}' is requesting access to the linked identity (account ID & account name) of account: {chain}: {accountName} ({accountId}).
account_id.request_tooltip: By default an anonymous link is provided. Certain apps/websites require access to your account id/name (e.g. for sign-in purposes). If this is the case, it is safe to 'Allow' here.

any_account_id.title: Account Details Request
any_account_id.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}' is requesting access to an account.

transfer.title: Transfer Request
transfer.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}' wants to initiate a transfer from { chain }:{ accountName }.
transfer.request_cta: Do you want to execute it?
transfer.server_error: The list of known scammers could not be loaded for checking, proceed with caution.
transfer.detected_scammer: The recipient is a known scammer, advice to abort.

rawsig.title: Request

headers.request: Do you want to approve the following raw signature?
headers.result: The following raw signature was approved:

rawsig.loading: Loading transaction details from blockchain, please wait.
rawsig.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}' has submitted the following transaction for account { chain }:{ accountName }.
rawsig.summary: This transaction contains {numOps} operations, you can browse through them below.
rawsig.summary_single: This transaction contains a single operation, you can browse through it below.
rawsig.request_cta: Do you want to execute it?

receipt.title: Do you want a receipt?
receipt.no: No, I don't want a receipt.

whitelist.prompt: Whitelist subsequent '{method}' requests from this app?

vote.title: Vote Request
vote.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}'  wants you to vote for the following {entity} with account { chain }:{ accountName }

message.title: Sign Message Request
message.request: App: '{appName}' from '{origin}' wants you to sign the following text with account { chain }:{ accountName }

getAccount.title: Account Details Request

headers.request: Do you want to share your account details?
headers.result: Your account details were shared.

getAccount.tooltip: Asks your wallet for blockchain account details

requestSignature.title: Signature Request

headers.request: Do you want to share your signature?
headers.result: Your signature was shared:

requestSignature.tooltip: Asks your wallet for blockchain signatures

injectedCall.title: Injected Call Request

headers.result: The following injected call was approved:

injectedCall.tooltip: Asks your wallet to handle an injected blockchain operation

headers.result: The following voting request was approved
The following message was signed:
The following NFT was signed:

verifyMessage.title: Verify Message Request

headers.request: Do you want to verify the following message?
headers.result: The following message was verified:

verifyMessage.tooltip: Verify a blockchain based signed message

transfer.title: Transfer Request

headers.request: Do you want to approve the following transfer request?
headers.result: The following transfer request was approved:

transfer.tooltip: Send assets from one account to another

limit_order_create.title: Limit order create request

headers.request: Approve the following limit order creation request?
headers.result: The following limit order was created:

limit_order_create.tooltip: An offer to sell an amount of an asset at a specified exchange rate by a certain time

headers.result: The following limit order was cancelled:

headers.request: Update your call order to the following?
headers.result: The following call order was updated:

headers.request: Do you want to create the following account?
headers.result: The following account was created:

account_update.title: Account update request

headers.request: Do you want to update the following account?
headers.result: The following account was updated:

account_update.tooltip: This operation is used to update an existing account. It can be used to update the authorities, or adjust the options on the account.

account_whitelist.title: Account whitelist request

headers.request: Update your account whitelist to the following?
headers.result: Your account whitelist was updated to the following:

account_whitelist.tooltip: This operation is used to whitelist and blacklist accounts, primarily for transacting in whitelisted assets

account_upgrade.title: Account upgrade request

headers.request: Upgrade your account to lifetime member?
headers.result: Your account was upgraded to lifetime member!

account_upgrade.tooltip: This operation is used to upgrade an account to a member, or renew its subscription.

account_transfer.title: Account transfer request

headers.request: Transfer account to a new owner?
headers.result: The following account was transferred to a new owner:

account_transfer.tooltip: Transfers the account to another account while clearing the white list

headers.result: The following asset was created:

headers.result: The asset was updated with the following details:
